description:
## Release (2025-05-13)

#### :rocket: Enhancement

#### :bug: Bug Fix

  * [#2469](https://github.com/embroider-build/embroider/pull/2469) fix: ensure minify can be disabled ([@Techn1x](https://github.com/Techn1x))
